item.title: Trump says 'great times' are ahead for U.S.
item.description: President Trump said Americans should've expected the chaos that has come from his tariffs and the upheaval of the economy.

item.title: In an ABC News interview, Trump says he's confident in Hegseth
item.description: President Trump seemed confident in Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth's ability, despite rising concerns of his performance.
